output:
I'm sitting here on my own now, crying my heart out, can't even see.
Didn't know what you meant when you said you were leaving, nobody did.
The stakes we made left us so low, but they brought us so close, just you and me.
The time we had was so fleeting, life in between, death, gotta let go.
I found out an hour ago, and I won't let you die alone, could you help me?
Get my pain, I'll be there for you, till the end.

Get my pain, I'll be there for you, till the end.
